duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare journal entries, reconcile and review inter-company transactions, and generate invoices as necessary.
Complete monthly bank reconciliations and monitor credit card charges, payment discrepancies, refunds, and returns.
Perform general ledger account variance analyses and reconciliations, assist in preparing month-end close, and assist with financial statement preparation.
Assist with year-end audit, maintain accounting documents and records, and assist with other accounting projects as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting (CPA and Yardi experience highly preferred)
